document.full_text: oil rose on friday, with brent crude surging past $123 a barrel, as improving u.s. consumer confidence and industrial production eased concerns about rising fuel costs.
document.title: oil up on rosier u.s. consumer sentiment, china
lines_and_colors: oil rose on friday, with brent crude surging past $123 a barrel, as improving u.s. consumer confidence and industrial production eased concerns about rising fuel costs.
